products.name: LEMONGRASS + GINGER
products.description: A refreshing blend of lemongrass and ginger, creating a zesty and invigorating tea experience. This unique combination offers a perfect balance of citrusy notes and warm, spicy undertones. Sourced from organic farms in India, this caffeine-free tea is perfect for any time of day.
features: Hindistan'ın organik çiftliklerinden el ile toplanan limonotu ve zencefil
70 gram: 35+ fincan çay için yeterli (fincan başına 0.48₺)
Kafeinsiz ve ferahlatıcı bir içecek

products.name: DARJEELING SECOND FLUSH
products.description: Known as the 'Champagne of Teas', our Darjeeling Second Flush offers a sophisticated and muscatel flavor profile. Harvested from the misty hills of Darjeeling, India, this premium black tea provides a smooth, floral taste with subtle fruity undertones.
features: Darjeeling'in sisli tepelerinden toplanan premium siyah çay
70 gram: 30+ fincan çay için yeterli (fincan başına 0.57₺)
Çiçeksi ve hafif meyvemsi aromalar içerir

products.name: ADACAY + GINGER
products.description: A traditional Turkish sage tea blended with warming ginger. This therapeutic combination brings together the earthy, aromatic qualities of sage with the spicy kick of ginger. Perfect for soothing the throat and warming the soul.
features: Toros Dağları'ndan toplanan adaçayı ve Hindistan zencefili karışımı
70 gram: 40+ fincan çay için yeterli (fincan başına 0.30₺)
Boğaz ağrılarına iyi gelen geleneksel karışım

products.name: KARADENIZ FLUSH
products.description: A tangy, lemony, and spicy herbal tea that is sourced from organic farms focused on regenerative farming practices in India. The organic ginger is grown in the gardens of the women who pluck our tea to provide them surplus revenue.
features: Rize'nin yüksek rakımlı çay bahçelerinden toplanan taze yapraklar
70 gram: 25+ fincan çay için yeterli (fincan başına 0.68₺)
Dik yamaçlarda organik yöntemlerle yetiştirilen premium siyah çay
